name: Button Pusher
description:
Button pusher is a simple game aimed at earning points. To accumulate as many of them as possible - you need to press the main button in the game as much as possible. To make this process easier - use the in-game store, which can help you earn points faster and easier in the game.

You will not only have access to a beautiful looking game. But still, it works properly. We carefully allow you to save all your progress in the game with the help of Creagoo Account. The only thing you need is to create an account. Next, just press 1 button to save the progress.

Development carried the main character - to give pleasure. Therefore, the main slogan: "Approach with love
